name: Dog Foster Carer Application
description: Note: Foster Carer positions are currently only available to Victorian residents.
footer: By submitting this form, you agree that the dog will remain the property of Homeless Hounds and that you will remain in contact with us throughout the duration of fostering. Please be aware that adoption fees will apply if you want to adopt as agreed at the beginning of the Fostering Period.
